export default function LeaveCheck() { const joiningMonth = 1; // January const currentMonth = new Date().getMonth() + 1; const totalCL = currentMonth - joiningMonth + 1; const appliedCL = 2; // from DB later const pendingCL = 1; // from DB later const availableCL = totalCL - appliedCL - pendingCL; return (
Leave Type Available Applied Pending
Casual Leave (CL) {availableCL} {appliedCL} {pendingCL}
Loss of Pay (LOP) â€” 1 0
); }
